title: Dragula
lastfmSummary: The title came from the name of a car on the classic TV show The Munsters. Their car was called the Dragula. A Mix of this song ("Si Non Oscillas, Noli Tintinnare Mix") was featured in the first Matrix movie in the beginning when Neo is at the dance club meeting Trinity. This song was used in the movie Idle Hands. This song was also in the movie The Watcher, you see the bad guy Griffin dancing and doing kung fu moves to this song. Read more on Last.fm.
